pull.title: depends: sqlite 3.46.1
pull.body: Update sqlite in depends from [3.38.5](https://sqlite.org/releaselog/3_38_5.html) to [3.46.1](https://sqlite.org/releaselog/3_46_1.html).

[`578fb67e259ad3e2...`](https://drahtbot.space/guix/bitcoin/bitcoin/a53ec63854caef35f0378bab9f1552f21c3a7025/guix_build.log.diff) |
Any particular reason for the bump?

Not super pressing. I've been looking at ways we could build sqlite with CMake, given that will be one of the last Autotools holdouts. Some builders for the amalgamation exist, but are mostly based off/more usable with a more recent version.
